participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Friendly and supportive, enjoys gaming and spending time with friends.
participant_1.background: I do not eat healthy. I have 3 kids. I like the group the rolling stones. I need a soda with me at all times.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Creative and resourceful, with a passion for baking and a law background.
participant_2.background: My landlord is raising my rent. Everyone says my pecan pie is the best they have ever had. I am an excellent baker. I went to law school. I was born on christmas day.

content.text: I'm so sorry to hear that your landlord is raising your rent. That's really tough.
Thanks. It's definitely not the best news I've ever gotten.
I bet. But hey, you're an excellent baker, right? Maybe you can start selling your pecan pies to make some extra money.
That's actually a really good idea! I never thought of that.
Well, you're welcome to use my kitchen. I'm always happy to help out a friend in need.
Thanks so much, that's really kind of you.
No problem. So, what kind of things do you like to bake?
I like to bake all kinds of things, but my specialty is pecan pie.
Oh, that's my favorite! I love pecan pie.
I'm glad to hear it. I'll have to make you some sometime.
I'd love that.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games, read, and watch movies.
Oh, cool. I like to play video games too. What games do you like to play?
I like to play all kinds of games, but my favorite genre is probably RPGs.
Oh, I like RPGs too. What's your favorite RPG?
My favorite RPG is probably Final Fantasy VII.
That's a great game. I've played it a few times.
It's so good. I've played it like five times.
Wow, that's a lot.
Yeah, I really like it.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I also like to read and watch movies.
